emitMeta(uint256,bytes).notice: Emit a single MetaV1 event. Typically this is sufficient for most use cases as a single MetaV1 event can contain many metas as a single cbor-seq. Metadata MUST match the metadata V1 specification for Rain metadata or tooling MAY drop it. `IMetaBoardV1` contracts MUST revert any metadata that does not start with the Rain metadata magic number.

hash(bytes).notice: Exposes native hashing algorithm (keccak256) to facilitate indexing data under its hash. This avoids the need to roll a new interface to include hashes in the event logs.
